content: 1 stone garden gnome a crochet pattern written and designed by mythic crochet and knit studios materials abbreviations us  yarn of your choice in the following colours terms  grey round round  green or another colour st stitch  brown optional blo back loop only  white or cream optional flo front loop only  hook that works well with your yarn weight chain chain  safety eyes or beads see pattern notes slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet  tapestry needle half_double_crochet half_double_crochet  scissors increase increase  stuffing decrease decrease bobble stitch see bobble page 2  © mythic crochet and knit studios 2025 this pattern is for personal use only it is not to be resold redistributed reposted or translated you may sell finished items from this pattern but please do not use my pictures to promote them 2 table of contents body 3 cloak 3 moss patch 4 optional book 4 cover 4 pages 5 pattern notes  time to complete 30min - 1 hour  gauge not important for this pattern  other notes you can now have garden gnomes in your house on your keys on your christmas tree or literally anywhere these little creatures of stone now turned yarn have a small patch of moss on the back of their cloaks from sitting in the yarn drawer for too long they work with any type of yarn you have and only use a small amount if you are using a finer yarn i use dk you will need to use beads or do some embroidery for the eyes the smallest safety eyes will work for worsted weight and above the cloak starts in the round and then transitions to working in row for the cape the blo and flo sts are for adding the moss patch later and the loops should be on the back enjoy instructions for bobble stitch you can use whatever version of the bobble stitch you know but here is the one i use yarn over yo put hook through stitch and pull up a loop yo and pull through two of the three loops with two loops still on your hook repeat that three more times in the same stitch you should now have 5 loops on your hook yo and pull through all 5 loops  © mythic crochet and knit studios 2025 this pattern is for personal use only it is not to be resold redistributed reposted or translated you may sell finished items from this pattern but please do not use my pictures to promote them 3 body in grey round 1 single_crochet 6 times in magic_ring 6 round 2 *single_crochet increase* 3 times 9 rnds 3-4 *single_crochet* all around 9 round 5 *single_crochet increase* 4 times increase in last st 14 round 6 single_crochet 2 increase 2 single_crochet 5 increase 2 single_crochet 3 18 round 7 single_crochet 5 bobble single_crochet 6 bobble single_crochet 5 18 rnds 8-9 *single_crochet* all around 18 round 10 single_crochet
